playerManipulation

Class ChangeProfileDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • playerManipulation.ChangeProfileDetails

  • public class ChangeProfileDetails
extends Object
    this class handles the changing of a player's profile details such as username, password and security information. The methods in this class allow a player to change his/her password, username and Security information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChangeProfileDetails() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean changePassword(String username, JPasswordField Inputtedpassword, JPasswordField reenterPassword)
      This method checks if the two given passwords are matching and if this is true it will update their password with the one inputted.
      static boolean changeSecurity(String username, String securityQuestion, String securityAnswer)
      This method handles changing a player's security question and security answer.
      static boolean changeUsername(String username, String newUsername)
      This method handles changing a players username with a new inputted one.

    • Method Detail

      • changePassword

        public static boolean changePassword(String username,
                     JPasswordField Inputtedpassword,
                     JPasswordField reenterPassword)
        This method checks if the two given passwords are matching and if this is true it will update their password with the one inputted.
        Parameters:
        username - the player's username
        Inputtedpassword - the new password for the player
        reenterPassword - the players reinputted password
        Returns:
        true if the password is changed, false otherwise

      • changeUsername

        public static boolean changeUsername(String username,
                     String newUsername)
        This method handles changing a players username with a new inputted one.
        Parameters:
        username - old username in the database
        newUsername - new username inputted by the player
        Returns:
        true if the username is changed, false otherwise

      • changeSecurity

        public static boolean changeSecurity(String username,
                     String securityQuestion,
                     String securityAnswer)
        This method handles changing a player's security question and security answer.
        Parameters:
        securityQuestion - the new security questioninputted by player
        securityAnswer - the new security answer inputted by player
        Returns:
        true if the changes have been made in the database, false otherwise
